alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:37PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 336 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brandon, moving east at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Brandon, Hillsborough River State Park, East Lake-Orient Park, Palm River-Clair Mel, University, Valrico, Seffner, Florida State Fairgrounds, Mango, Thonotosassa, Dover, Plant City Airport, Tampa Executive Airport, University Of South Florida, Lettuce Lake Park, and Orient Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
